title: PC Building Simulator Soundtrack
description: Now you too can make your home workshop feel like the real deal with the perfect backing track for your PC building sessions: the official, original soundtrack for the best selling game PC Building Simulator!
longDescription:
Use the calming tones of ‘Light’ to sooth your cable configuring woes. Tap along to ‘RAM Out Of Luck’ while you wait for your virus scan to complete. And test your sound drivers with the celebrated rap rhymes of ‘The Ultimate PC’. Whatever your PC building efforts require: you’ll find it here.

![Tracks](https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/egs-pcbuildingsimulatorsoundtrack-theirregularcorporation-digitalextras-g2-00-1153x829-89efc27c420f.jpg)

This release also includes the three tracks produced for the Esports Expansion DLC and 3 brand new tracks from the IT Expansion

# Additional Credits

Produced by Gavin Harrison (with Thomas Peters for Tracks 2, 3, 10 & 14)

Music Written & Performed by:
Smearing Thermal Compound - Gavin Harrison & Lorenzo De Feo
RAM Out of Luck - Gavin Harrison & Lorenzo De Feo
A Thousand GigaFLOPs Without You - Gavin Harrison & Rachel Simpson
Linear Feedback Shift Register - Gavin Harrison & Lorenzo De Feo
Light - Gavin Harrison & Rachel Simpson
Upload Download - Gavin Harrison & Rachel Simpson
Inverse Fourier Transformation - Gavin Harrison
Trace a Ray Reflection - Gavin Harrison
Advanced Host Controller Interface - Gavin Harrison & Lorenzo De Feo
The Ultimate PC - Gavin Harrison & Chris Blundell
Trace a Ray Reflection (Retro Version) - Gavin Harrison
Zero Day (Esports Expansion) - Gavin Harrison
Lock n L.E.D (Esports Expansion) - Gavin Harrison & Lorenzo De Feo
GeT_iT_RiGhT (Esports Expansion) - Gavin Harrison
When It Breaks (IT Expansion) - Written and performed by Gavin Harrison. Produced by Gavin Harrison
Taped Out (IT Expansion) - Written and performed by Gavin Harrison. Produced by Gavin Harrison
Immortal (IT Expansion) - Written and performed by Taylor-Morris, Gavin Harrison and Lorenzo De Feo. Produced by Gavin Harrison, Thom
